name: Creativity for Kids Mini Garden: Magical Unicorn Terrarium Kit - Unicorn Gifts for Girls, Kids Craft and Toy, Unique Valentine's Day Gifts (Ages 6+)
short_description: UNICORN GARDEN KIT FOR KIDS – Decorate, plant and grow a mini unicorn paradise! Quick growing seeds and unicorn accents bring your magical garden to life

COMPLETE GARDENING FOR KIDS – Everything you need is included, just add imagination! Unicorn craft kit includes potting mix, quick growing chia seeds, themed stickers, dimensional accents, fun mini figures and decorative sand. (Completed garden measures 5 ¼” h x 3” w.)

MAGICAL QUICK GROW SEEDS – Plant, water and place in direct sunlight to get amazing results! Included chia seeds sprout within 3-5 days of planting for immediate results and fun! The potting mix is vermiculite. All seeds are from and packaged in the USA
FUN SCIENCE LEARNING – Mix science and art for a fun experience! Inspires creativity as gardeners personalize their mini magical garden with the unicorn themed stickers and accents
UNICORN CRAFT KIT – Growing your own unicorn garden is a unique arts and crafts activity for girls and boys that develops nurturing skills, responsibility and creative confidence!
product_description: Experience the wonder of nature all year as you take the fun of gardening indoors with the Creativity for Kids Magical Mini Garden Kit – Unicorn Egg Terrarium. Mini Gardening is a unique, fun experience that combines both arts and crafts with science (STEAM) as your child creates their own mini unicorn garden. A great unicorn gift for girls ages 6-8+! Perfect for beginners, this unicorn terrarium kit for girls kit features quick-growing chia seeds that sprout within 3-5 days! Just add water for a magical science experience. Our guaranteed-to-grow terrarium kit for kids means a green thumb for everyone! The kids craft contains everything you need to decorate, plant, and grow your own unicorn garden. Complete gardening kit and kids toy include potting mix, quick-growing chia seeds, unicorn-themed stickers, dimensional accents, fun minis - rainbows, and decorative sand. The potting mix is vermiculite, and all seeds are from and packaged in the USA. Mini gardens make the perfect unique gift for kids or presents for 7 year old girls. This unicorn craft activity makes the perfect addition to Easter Baskets stuffers, small gifts for kids, birthday gifts and so much more! Unicorn toys allow for indoor gardening - anytime. Let creativity and self-expression take the lead as you decorate your magical unicorn garden. Colorful unicorn stickers and accents bring your garden to life and spark creativity and wonder of magical unicorns. Growing a mini garden is a unique activity, and an opportunity to develop nurturing skills, responsibility, and creative confidence! Since 1971, Creativity for Kids has proudly created unique craft experiences for children to create, explore and build creative confidence for life. This unicorn girls toy features non-toxic materials that are kid-friendly and recommended for ages 6-8+. For best results, do not put your terrarium in direct sunlight. Completed unicorn garden measures 5.25” h x 3” w.
